title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama.

summary: Official Python client library for Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model with file uploads, code highlighting, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced command-line wrapper with interactive prompts, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host a Discord bot powered by any Ollama model with slash commands.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor, and chat with code using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that switches between Ollama models in real time.

summary: Dagger module to run Ollama CI steps with caching and GPU support.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir wrapper for Ollama with GenServer-based streaming.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Production-ready docker-compose stack with Ollama, web UI, monitoring, and reverse proxy.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for fine-tuning, multi-modal, and advanced Ollama patterns.

title: ollama-obsidian

title: ollama-slack-bot
